MWC.GUI.Canvas.AWT

Class AWTCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Canvas
        • MWC.GUI.Canvas.AWT.AWTCanvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, CanvasType

    public final class AWTCanvas
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements CanvasType
    AWT implementation of a canvas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
